mapper.select: select r.rev_id, r.res_no rev_res_no, r.rev_content, r.rev_score, r.rev_enroll_date, s.*, p.rev_photo_no, p.rev_id rev_photo_rev_id, p.rev_original_filename, p.rev_renamed_filename from review r left join reservation s on r.res_no = s.res_no left join review_photo p on r.rev_id = p.rev_id order by r.rev_enroll_date desc

select a.* from ( select r.rev_id, r.res_no review_res_no, r.rev_content, r.rev_score, r.rev_enroll_date, s.*, p.rev_photo_no, p.rev_id rev_photo_rev_id, p.rev_original_filename, p.rev_renamed_filename, (select zone_code from camp c where s.camp_id = camp_id) zone_code from review r left join reservation s on r.res_no = s.res_no left join review_photo p on r.rev_id = p.rev_id ) a
a.zone_code = #{campZoneType}
order by
rev_enroll_date desc
rev_score desc, rev_enroll_date desc

select a.* from ( select r.rev_id, r.res_no review_res_no, r.rev_content, r.rev_score, r.rev_enroll_date, s.*, p.rev_photo_no, p.rev_id rev_photo_rev_id, p.rev_original_filename, p.rev_renamed_filename, (select zone_code from camp c where s.camp_id = camp_id) zone_code from review r left join reservation s on r.res_no = s.res_no left join review_photo p on r.rev_id = p.rev_id ) a where rev_id = #{revId}

select count(distinct a.rev_id) from ( select a.*, (select zone_code from camp where a.camp_id = camp_id) zone_code from ( select r.*, (select camp_id from reservation where res_no = r.res_no) camp_id from review r ) a ) a left join review_photo p on a.rev_id = p.rev_id where rev_photo_no is not null
and a.zone_code = #{campZoneType}
